creator: ITForge Ltd
descriptionHtml:
With Actions App now it's possible to run your pre-defined shell scripts from your phone with one tap! It provides access to hundreds of Linux commands and tools to build custom Actions. Like, Kubernetes, Cloud CLIs, Python, Bash shell, and many more! The app is streaming near real-time the script output, or can download the latest output if the Action is a scheduled task.

It is a powerful tool designed for IT professionals or hobbyists with scripting skills. You can launch your scripts immediately, with one tap, or as scheduled tasks, in a temporary dedicated execution environment with strong security and networking features like server-side OpenVPN.

Why to use this app?
- For APIs or IT infrastructure health checks.
- For manual recovery actions cases.
- For business scheduled actions.
- For servers management or scaling.
- For profit & fun.

App Features:
- in-app script quick modifications.
- One-finger two taps away easy to use interface.
- One time, Monthly, Weekly, Daily, Hourly, /15 mins, /10 mins or /5 mins schedules support.
- Secure Secrets Management.
- Lock screen with PIN.
- Full account control.

Environment Features:
- Bash Shell with the most common Linux commands.
- AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure CLI tools ready.
- Kubernetes kubectl ready.
- Python 3 ready.
- OpenVPN server-side automate initiation.
- Firewall protected.
- In more detail, supports the commands: bash, cat, cp, date, echo, egrep, false, fgrep, getopt, grep, gunzip, gzip, kill, link, ln, ls, lzop, mkdir, mknod, mktemp, mpstat, mv, netstat, pidof, printenv, ps, pwd, rev, rm, rmdir, sed, sleep, stat, stty, tar, touch, true, usleep, watch, zcat, ipaddr, tunctl, udhcpc, awk, aws, bc, bunzip2, bzcat, bzip2, cmp, cpio, crontab, curl, cut, dc, diff, dirname, dos2unix, du, env, expand, expr, fab, find, flock, gcov, gpg, hexdump, iconv, id, killall, kubectl, ldd, less, lessecho, logger, lsof, lzcat, lzma, lzopcat, md5sum, mkfifo, nc, nslookup, objcopy, objdump, od, patch, pgrep, pip, pkill, printf, pscan, pstree, python, scp, secret-tool, seq, sftp, sha1sum, sha256sum, sha3sum, sha512sum, sort, split, ssh, ssh-add, ssh-agent, ssh-copy-id, sshtunnel, strings, strip, sum, tac, tail, tee, test, time, timeout, top, tr, traceroute, traceroute6, troff, truncate, uniq, unix2dos, unlink, unlzma, unlzop, unshare, unxz, unzip, uptime, uudecode, uuencode, wc, wget, which, xargs, xz, xzcat, yes, openvpn and more.
 Do you think you need one more command in the environment? Install the app and let us know!

Specs:
OAUTH 2.0 Authentication layer. ( HIPAA eligible and PCI DSS, SOC, ISO/IEC 27001, ISO/IEC 27017, ISO/IEC 27018, and ISO 9001 compliant for the authentication and ePay).
TLS 1.2 data transmission with ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256 RSA 4096 bits strong encryption.
No persistence server-side storage with on-demand secrets in RAM injection.

Pricing:
Free credits for new users. If you’ll spend your credits you can subscribe to one of our plans for monthly credits refill with the option to cancel it in-app any time.

Requirements:
Bash shell scripting skills.
descriptionShort: Run your shell scripts from your phone in a serverless Docker environment

- Firewall protected.
- In more detail, supports the commands: bash, cat, cp, date, echo, egrep, false, fgrep, getopt, grep, gunzip, gzip, kill, link, ln, ls, lzop, mkdir, mknod, mktemp, mpstat, mv, netstat, pidof, printenv, ps, pwd, rev, rm, rmdir, sed, sleep, stat, stty, tar, touch, true, usleep, watch, zcat, ipaddr, tunctl, udhcpc, awk, aws, bc, bunzip2, bzcat, bzip2, cmp, cpio, crontab, curl, cut, dc, diff, dirname, dos2unix, du, env, expand, expr, fab, find, flock, gcov, gpg, hexdump, iconv, id, killall, kubectl, ldd, less, lessecho, logger, lsof, lzcat, lzma, lzopcat, md5sum, mkfifo, nc, nslookup, objcopy, objdump, od, patch, pgrep, pip, pkill, printf, pscan, pstree, python, scp, secret-tool, seq, sftp, sha1sum, sha256sum, sha3sum, sha512sum, sort, split, ssh, ssh-add, ssh-agent, ssh-copy-id, sshtunnel, strings, strip, sum, tac, tail, tee, test, time, timeout, top, tr, traceroute, traceroute6, troff, truncate, uniq, unix2dos, unlink, unlzma, unlzop, unshare, unxz, unzip, uptime, uudecode, uuencode, wc, wget, which, xargs, xz, xzcat, yes, openvpn and more.
 Do you think you need one more command in the environment? Install the app and let us know!

Specs:
OAUTH 2.0 Authentication layer. ( HIPAA eligible and PCI DSS, SOC, ISO/IEC 27001, ISO/IEC 27017, ISO/IEC 27018, and ISO 9001 compliant for the authentication and ePay).
TLS 1.2 data transmission with ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256 RSA 4096 bits strong encryption.
No persistence server-side storage with on-demand secrets in RAM injection.

Pricing:
Free credits for new users. If you’ll spend your credits you can subscribe to one of our plans for monthly credits refill with the option to cancel it in-app any time.

Requirements:
Bash shell scripting skills.

- For manual recovery actions cases.
- For business scheduled actions.
- For servers management or scaling.
- For profit & fun.

Description:
With Actions App now it's possible to run well tested shell scripts from your phone with one tap! It provides access to hundreds of Linux commands and tools to build custom Actions. Like, Kubernetes, Cloud CLIs, Python, Bash shell, and many more! The app is streaming near real-time the script output or can download the latest output if the Action is a scheduled task.

- One-finger two taps away easy to use interface.
- One time, Monthly, Weekly, Daily, Hourly, /15 mins, /10 mins or /5 mins schedules support.
- Secure Secrets Management.
- Lock screen with PIN.
- Full account control.
- MFA protected.

creator: ITForge Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Load code and scripts from your Git repository and run it from your phone in a secure cloud environment. (No Ads)

Documentation: https://github.com/itforgeuk/Script-Actions

Very useful for DevOps, SLEs, Cloud / Infrastructure Engineers, Software Developers.

Why use this app?
- To execute Disaster Recovery Actions.
- For APIs or IT infrastructure health checks.
- For manual recovery actions cases.
- For business scheduled actions.
- For servers management or scaling.
- Supports Python, NodeJS, Bash, kubectl, Cloud CLIs and more!
- For portable profit & fun.

Description:
With Actions App now it's possible to run well tested shell scripts or code from your phone with one tap! It provides access to hundreds of Linux commands and tools to build custom Actions. Like, Kubernetes, Cloud CLIs, Python, Bash shell, and many more! The app is streaming near real-time the script output or can download the latest output if the Action is a scheduled task.

It is a powerful tool designed for IT professionals or hobbyists with scripting and coding skills. You can launch your scripts immediately, with one tap, or as scheduled tasks, in a temporary dedicated execution environment with strong security.

App Features:
- Set in-app Git repo, branch name and script path.
- One-finger two taps away easy to use interface.
- One time, Monthly, Weekly, Daily, Hourly, /15 mins, /10 mins or /5 mins schedules support.
- Secure Secrets Management.
- Full account control.

Environment Features:
- Bash Shell with the most common Linux commands.
- AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure CLI tools ready.
- Kubernetes kubectl ready.
- Python 3 ready.
- NodeJS ready.
- Firewall protected.
Do you think you need one more command in the environment? Install the app and let us know!

Specs:
OAUTH 2.0 Authentication layer. ( HIPAA eligible and PCI DSS, SOC, ISO/IEC 27001, ISO/IEC 27017, ISO/IEC 27018, and ISO 9001 compliant for the authentication and ePay).
TLS 1.2 data transmission with ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256 RSA 4096 bits strong encryption.
No persistence server-side storage with on-demand secrets in RAM injection.

Pricing:
Free credits for new users. If you’ll spend your credits you can buy more. Cost less than 10p per run.

Requirements:
Development skills!
